critique: The executive order is a very formal and legal document. The order does not want the audience to feel any emotion. The order is simply extending and continuing in effect to and including June 30, 1949, the provisions of Executive Order No. 9870 of July 8, 1947, prescribing regulations pertaining to the granting of and accounting for certain foreign service allowances and allotments. Therefore, all the emotions should be 1.
